citation: Proclamation under the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Co-operative Schemes (Administrative Actions) Act 2001 fix 22 August 2001 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

13 August 2001

W. J. E. COX

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. PATMORE

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 August 2001

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
